name: Sludge Fighters
description:
If you stand on the ceiling, is it the floor now? Fight your friends from the floor, wall, or ceiling! Gravity follows you in Sludge Fighters.

In this online multiplayer arena, join your friends or host a public game. Turn into a ball of sludge to launch onto a new surface or sneak under arena obstacles! Run, punch, and kick to knock out other players.

In Sludge Fighters:
  • Find power-up stations to gain a quick advantage - but watch out, power-up effects only last a limited time!
  • Boost with a power-up like Stretchee Arm Punch or Whoa I'm All Big Mode
  • Choose your color
  • Choose swirly sludge or still sludge
  • Customize your controller or keyboard/mouse controls in settings
